level.heading: DCPS CASES – CONFIDENTIALITY OF THE RECORD (§ 1-2909)

level.text: The OAH record in any case referred by DCPS is confidential. Only the following persons may have access to that record:
The minor student’s parent, guardian, or representative;
Any person who has the written consent of the adult student or the minor student’s parent or guardian; and
School officials with a legitimate interest.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11122 (December 23, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3128, 3131 (April 20, 2012).
